divs: sighting detailsi was getting off from work and just so happened to look up in the sky. (it was a slight cloud coveraged and noted these blue lights randomly flying. the first conclusion i came to was, there was a nightclub\car lot or some event occurring that were flashing or projecting these lights so i drove around the area to see if any lights were being projected\even went to a higher elevation and could not find the source. when i arrived at home, my neighbors were outside and i asked them to look. they also saw the lights(blue disks) one of my neighbors suggested that the mcwance science center may have been conducting an experiment, however, i called the next day and they stated no. i work at a hospital and pretty much believe in having solid facts. but i saw this and it was amazing.
trends: There have been 659 other sightings in Montgomery
There were no other sightings in Montgomery on or around November 10th 2007
